title: The solution to dark harvest
body:
I think it's pretty evident that dark harvest is OP if _multiple_ champions proc it on the _same_ target and double dark harvest bot possibly with a dark harvest jungle is just disgusting because of how easily it executes a low health champion then allows the team to move on to the next target. 

I think that dark harvest can be "solved" or at least managed if it gets the same fix that fixed double heal botlanes. Multiple dark harvest procs on the same target within a certain time period should have reduced effectiveness. 

With the incoming base nerfs I think this will lead dark harvest closer to the ideal balance-able state. Thoughts?

replies.body: The rune just needs to be removed. Anything that gives bonus damage JUST because someone wasn't above 50% HP is unbalanced and unhealthy. There's no middle ground that's both fair and fun
Thats like several Champion abilities as well haha. I do agree however that Dark Harvest just needs to go. nothing like being like oh I am good with this trade (dark harvest procs) and I am dead....

I was just making a joke. I am agreeing that dark harvest sucks.

Why do I have a gut feeling this guy is Colton147.

So me getting to half health and then basically killed by one attack/item/summoner spell because that person had DH is fair?

You can't avoid getting below 50% health unless you're literally just sitting in fountain afk. Everyone being able to proc DH on that one person also isn't fair when you literally can't avoid it, especially when it procs off of items and summoner spells.

There is no way to balance this rune, not with the way it is, especially when there's some champions that do more damage the lower your health is. Varus and Veigar for example.

Old DH did more damage late game, and this one does more damage mid game as an assassin, the damage really hasn't been majorly shifted until you start scaling, but it's impossible to deny scaling unless you just never fall below half hp nowadays
